articles.title: About me
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
I am a post-doctoral researcher at the Future Cities Laboratory of the Singapore-ETH Centre.
Bio
I hold a PhD on Advanced Spatial Analysis from the Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis (CASA), The Bartlett, University College London (UCL), studied Digital Media and Culture at the University of Edinburgh and Archicture Engineering at the National Technical University of Athens (NTUA).

          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Panos Mavros
          
          
            
              Hi there!
              
              I am an architecturally-trained spatial cognition scientist living in Singapore. Currently I work as a senior post-doctoral researcher at the Future Cities Laboratory (FCL) of the Singapore-ETH Centre and the Chair of Cognitive Science, ETH Zürich. I love talking about cities, urban design, navigation, and cycling.
